profile:
Miracle Marble is a leading Toronto’s fabricator/installer of Marble, Granite and Quartz Countertops that ships from our extensive workshop to anywhere in Ontario. We make kitchen counter tops, vanity tops, tub surrounds, decks, fireplaces, table tops, bar tops, reception desks, and more - virtually any item your project requires.

Our services include an extended knowledgeable technical team, to assist you in your selection process. Miracle Marble is the perfect choice for home owners, builders, designers and interior decorators with a dream to build a counter top, fireplace, Jacuzzi etc.

profile:
Dear  Customers, Dear Friends
 
Thank you very much for your support, warm feedbacks and all references that we are getting from you. 
We are here to serve you and will gladly accept the opportunity to exceed your expectations. We are so passionate about the quality of our work and the treatment of our customers, we want you to know just what you can expect when you buy your marble or granite counter tops from Marble Treasure.
 
    The reason we are in business is to serve you.
    Your concerns, needs and desires are our top priority.
    You are not dependent on us; we are dependent on you.
    Your inquiries are not an interruption of our work; they are the reason for it.
    You do us a favor when you call and we feel privileged to serve you.
    You represent an integral part of our business; just like our staff.
    You tell us what you want and we will strive to fulfill that want.
    You are the client. It is not our place to argue with you but to see that you are satisfied.
    You are deserving of the most courteous and attentive treatment we can provide.
    You are our lifeblood. We exist to exceed your expectations.
 
Sincerely,
 
Marble Treasure Inc Team
 
 
Showroom hours:
 
Monday –Thursday 10am-7pm
Friday from 10am-6pm and Sat from 10am-4pm
Sunday closed
service_area: GTA, Toronto, North York, Mississauga, Oakville, Aurora, New Market, Richmond Hill, Vaughan, Maple, Courtice, Oshawa, Milton, and more.
hours: Mon- Fri 10:00am-8p:00am. Sat 10 :00am-5:00pm. Sun By appointment only

profile:
SL Stone Works is well committed to giving their valued customers quality, attention to details, professionalism, and total satisfaction. No project is too big or too small for us to complete with precision, quality, and care. We are working with the newest technology, CNC, for kitchen solution.

SL Stone Works was founded by Sarat Lao in 2013, and we believe in giving back. We offer humanitarian work in Cambodia by donating 2% of our sales to orphanages in hopes of rebuilding our community, a conglomerate of Kitchen Counter tops, Bar tops, Fireplaces, Residential, Commercial business , and home renovation entities, GTA, across Canada and Cambodia.

The combined expertise of our partner companies, Quality Marble Design Inc. SI04 Stone Inc. Lapidus Surface Inc., and Square Peg Woodworking Inc. has been very successful for over 20 years.

We offer very competitive price points through our established network of suppliers, services, and other resources, our consultation is free at your place, our turn around is fast, and our team is highly admired for the quality of their workmanship, holds a diverse portfolio of projects.

Please follow in our YouTube channel 

https://youtube.com/channel/UCDt8TzA2M40lntSk4Q6oNJA

Designing the look you want while staying within your budget.

Founder and Owner,
Sarat Lao
specialities: Kitchen Design & Renovation, Bathroom Renovation, Full-Service Renovation, Custom Cabinetry, Bar Space, Wall Cladding, Fireplaces, Flooring, & Office Spaces

profile:
GTA Countertops has more than 10 years of combined experience in the fabrication and installation of stone products. We purchase a carefully selected variety of granite, marble and quartz in large quantities and stock it locally. This system allows us to offer the luxury of real, natural granite or quartz counter tops at very affordable prices.
 
We pride ourselves in helping you achieve a more beautiful, money saving and practical approach to improving your dream home, we do not outsource any part of your project to another company, from start to finish, it is completed by our company!

profile:
Latitude Countertops is known for producing excellent quality Natural and Engineered Stone Countertops. Our commitment to provide top notch service has made us the largest fabricator of granite & quartz counter tops in the Toronto area.  Latitude fabricates  natural stone such as Granite and Marble from reputable suppliers. You don't need to worry about the quality of your stone, we only deal with the best. 
We work with all the leading Quartz companies such as  Caesarstone, Silestone, LG Viatera, Hanstone, Compac, and Diamastone. We will also fabricate acrylics such as Corian, Hi Macs and Staron.  
Customers can purchase their Kitchen countertops & Bathroom vanities directly or through our vast dealer network. We work with dealers all over Southern and Northeastern Ontario. To find a dealer near you check our website, as well for remnants and special offers visit our website www.latitudecountertops.com and view our blog at blog.latitudeonline.ca 
We meet the needs of our Builders, renovators and Home owners throughout Ontario.

To find a dealer close to you please visit our website.
service_area: Ontario;  G.T.A., Northern Ontario, Eastern Ontario, Southern Ontario, Western Ontario, Ajax, Whitby, Peterborough, Kawarthas, Peel, York, Courtice, Durham, Peterborough, Cobourg, Port Hope, Oakville, Burlington, Mississauga, Kingston, Trenton, Belleville, Napanee, Midland, Owen Sound, Wiarton, Orillia, Barrie, Innisfill, Alliston, Milton, Georgetown, Orangeville, Shellburne,
products:
Kitchen countertops and bathroom vanity countertops and shower and tub surrounds in Natural Stone such as Granite, Marble, Quartz such as Caesarstone Quartz, LG Vitera Quartz, Silestone Quartz, Hanstone Quartz, Compac Quartz, DuPont Zodiaq, DuPont Corian, Samsung Staron, Blanco Premium Sinks and Faucets.
We also do Laundry Room countertops, Entertainment Center countertops and bars, tub surrounds, fireplace walls and Hearths.
Tables and many other Natural and Engineered stone applications.
services: Latitude works on a Guaranteed 8 -10business day turnaround from countertop template to installation.  We digitally template all Kitchen and Bathroom countertops and can do so without removing your exiting countertop.  We also provide a countertop removal and or disposal service if you need to have your existing countertop removed before the new one is installed.  Our template process will take from 30min to 1.5hours.  Following the template, we will fabricate your custom countertop and return to install it within 10 business days, guaranteed.  Installations can take from 1 to 4 hours depending on the size of the project.   We also alter existing natural stone and acrylic countertops to fit new appliances.
brands: Caesarstone Quartz, Hanstone Quartz, Compac Quartz, LG Viatera Quartz, Silestone Quartz, DuPont Zodiaq, DuPont Corian, Samsung Staron, Blanco Premium Sinks and Faucets and Elegant Stainless Steel Sinks.
specialities:
!!!!  NEW IN JUNE 2014, Latitude now offers Granite and Quarzite Countertops with a 25 Year Stain Proof Warranty !!!!
We also have 5 colours of granite on promotion, available at $38.00 per square foot. Please contact us for more information.
Check out our remnants in our showroom, a vast selection of quartz, granite and marble.
warranty_terms: 1 year seam performance, Manufacturer warranty on Quartz slabs, 25 Year Stain Proof Warranty on Gran
name: Latitude Countertops

profile:
At TERĀIN Landscaping Construction Inc., our client-centric approach focuses on creating the best customer experience on every project. Whether it is designing a new walkway to guide the path home or cleaning up an area of the backyard that lacks flow, our team is dedicated to providing excellent craftsmanship to reinvigorate even the most complex spaces. Our construction keeps longevity in mind, as clients continue to feel satisfied with project outcomes well into the future.

While TERĀIN Landscaping Construction Inc. is fairly new, our passionate, organized and hardworking team brings over 10 years of experience to the table. Needless to say, we are motivated to ensure that each client is 100% satisfied. If you can dream it, we can elaborate on the vision through innovative design ideas that translate a simple idea to a stunning reality. 

Explore our professional drone footage and navigate through our reviews to see for yourself.

profile:
Welcome to Quality Marble Design. Why Us? … because we are well committed to providing quality craftsmanship, exceptional service in every renovation, and remodeling project we tackle, our primary goal is your total satisfaction, with more than a decade in this industry we can positively advise you of all the options you have in your natural and manufactured stone countertop or in the cabinetry, inclusive of design, finish, and the colors, so all you have to do is set back and enjoy while keeping the stress away.

Over ten years serving greater Toronto area and providing the largest selection of granite, quartz, and other natural stone counter tops, guaranteed service with no hidden or extra expenditure.

profile:
Ayers Stone Inc is a trusted fabricator and installer of natural and engineered stone in Richmond Hill, Canada. We have been continuing delivering our customers products in high quality and best service they deserve! Offering delivery and installation to cities in GTA area and long-distance if required. Dedicated on meeting customers’ needs and give professional suggestions on kitchen countertop design, material selection and coordination. We're a 1 stop service for free measurement, design, fabrication, installation and warranty.

Working closely with the most professional stone and sink suppliers in GTA, we give our customers access to the best and latest global products with competitive price for kitchen counter tops, tub surroundings, vanity tops, tabletops, fireplace surroundings, floors and other accessories.

Hours: Monday--Saturday 9:30 am-6:00 pm (Book by appointment)
We are located at: 20 Wertheim Ct, Unit 16, Richmond Hill, ON L4B 3A

Tel: 647-804-7388
